# Moderation Commands

# Setup Moderation Commands

# Enable/Disable Moderation Feature:

/mod setup enable/disable

# Add Moderation Log:

/mod setup modlog [channel]

# Set Mute Role:

/mod setup mute [role]

# Add Moderator Members or Roles:

/mod moderators addusers [user]

/mod moderators addroles [role]

# Remove Moderator Members or Roles:

/mod moderators removeusers [user]

/mod moderators removeroles [role]

# Add Whitelisted Members or Roles:

/mod whitelist addusers [user]

/mod whitelist addroles [role]

# Remove Whitelisted Members or Roles:

/mod whitelist removeusers [user]

/mod whitelist removeroles [role]

# Moderating Commands

# Create a Modnote on a Member:

/modnote [user] [note]

# Check all Member Cases (modnote, warn, mute, kick, ban):

/case [user]

# Purge Messages:

NOT AVAILABLE

NOT AVAILABLE

NOT AVAILABLE

NOT AVAILABLE

NOT AVAILABLE

NOT AVAILABLE

# Warn a Member:

  • Sends a DM with the Warning

/warn [user] [reason]

# Mute/Unmute a Member:

  • Sends a DM on Mute with the given reason and a DM, when the mute is revoked.

/mute [user] [reason]

/unmute [user] [reason]

# Kicks a Member:

  • Sends a DM to the Member with the reason, that they got kicked.

/kick [user] [reason]

# Ban/Unban a Member:

  • Sends a DM on Ban with the given reason and a DM, when the Ban is revoked.

/ban [user] [removeafter] [reason]

/unban [user] [reason]

# Add a (temp) Role:

/addrole [user] [role] [removeafter]

# Dehoist Members:

  • Dehoists Members (Change Nicknames), which have Special Characters like !, *, .

/dehoist list

/dehoist user [user] [new_nickname]

/dehoist all [new_nickname]

Last Updated: 9/6/2021, 4:27:04 PM
